12 Simple Rules

1 - This is a game so please do try to keep it civilized.

2 - I would prefer votes were made with vote tags, like VOTE: Obvscum. You do not need to unvote before you vote again, although it makes my job slightly easier.

3 - Once a player reaches a majority of all votes in play that person is lynched and twilight begins immediately. No votes or unvotes will be counted during twilight.

4 - The dead don't talk. Not even a "bah" post.

5 - There is no talking about this game outside of this thread while the game is ongoing. Period. Zero tollerance on this rule.

6 - Do not edit, delete, alter, or in any way change your posts. Breaking this rule leaves me free to practice my literary works of art on your so called posts.

7 - Players are expected to request prods on others that have failed to post for at least 48 hours. Any player to accumulate 3 prods without any sign of changing his or her ways will be replaced. If the entire thread drags on too long a deadline will be imposed accordingly.

8 - if you are going to be V/la for any reason please post in thread and send a PM to the mod as well. This ensures the mod is aware of your lack of activity. If the mod is unaware of the V/La for any reason it is considered the players fault and barring situational evidence any prods given in that time will remain.

9 - Night will last a maximum of 72 hours. All players are expected to complete their night actions in a timely fashion. Any player who expects to be V/la during a night phase should presend any and all actions to help speed up the game.

10 - Do not quote any PM's from the Mod unless otherwise specified by me. Paraphrasing is acceptable as long as it does not include any specifics people can draw conclusions from. If you are unsure if something is acceptable or not clear it with the mod before posting it.

11 - Unless otherwise specified, deadlines will result in a no lynch.

12 - This is my first game modding on this site. I may not be perfect but I strive to be. If you notice any errors or ommisions on my part, please notify me immediately via PM so my oversight can be rectified.

Town PM Example

You are a vanilla member of the town and win when all members of the mafia are eliminated.
